data.name: LogSeleccionL1
data.value: we offer the following comprehensive selection logistics solutions that consist of selecting different products that will be sent to the same address, after handling, if the client so requires.

data.name: LogSeleccionL3
data.value: Complementary service to the selection or picking service. We manage the returns of material that our client's dealers return due to quality problems, damage, order errors,...

data.name: LogSeleccionL4
data.value: These parts are received, classified due to return and according to the client's instructions, they proceed to the next phase or service.

data.name: MonPreConL1
data.value: We offer the following comprehensive logistics solutions for assemblies, subassemblies and preparation of assemblies based on the reception of different components from different suppliers, which after an adequate assembly process result in a semi-product that will require a subsequent assembly process or will directly result in an end product.

data.name: Pag_Que_es_Espack
data.value: It comprises a series of logistics companies dedicated to all those activities that, depending on the volume or complexity of management, are likely to be carried out independently of the normal manufacturing process, allowing companies to concentrate on their main activity and in this way. ... INCREASE YOUR COMPETITIVENESS

data.name: Pag_ServiciosLog
data.value: Espack, Integral Logistics Services, provides the following logistics services:

data.name: ProLogEspL1
data.value: We are open to any system or process that the client requires in their material.

data.name: ProLogEspL3
data.value: CKD: It is a program for sending automotive components of certain vehicle models, from the manufacturing plant of said automobiles to another plant located in a different country, where they will be assembled.

data.name: ProLogEspL4
data.value: SKD: It is a program that consists of disassembling some of the components of the vehicle and providing them with maximum protection for their shipment together with the vehicle from which they have been disassembled, from the manufacturing plant of said automobiles to another plant located in a different country. , where they will be assembled.

data.name: ProLogEspL5
data.value: Cleaning, priming, emburletado and supply of crystals to the production chain.

data.name: RevInsRecuL1
data.value: We offer the following comprehensive logistics solutions for review, inspection and recovery:

data.name: RevInsRecuL2
data.value: By indications of the client, or by our detection, we can review the components of any assembly before its assembly, or of finished material before dispatching it to the final client, in the event that it may have some type of defect or deviation produced during its manufacture.

data.name: RevInsRecuL3
data.value: The reviewed or selected material can be recovered with handling operations with specific technical tools to transform the material into SUITABLE.

data.name: SoftwareL1
data.value: We develop our own custom software. This means maximum flexibility in the reporting process and the ability to make improvements and add new services.

data.name: SoftwareL2
data.value: Due to our customization capacity, we can create import/export interfaces that link our clients' applications with ours to guarantee an optimal response and information flow.

data.name: SoftwareL3
data.value: Our EWS (Espack Warehousing System) software allows us to obtain detailed information on arrivals, stocks, shipments, FIFO control, discrepancies, etc.

data.name: SoftwareL4
data.value: One of our companies is responsible for any matter related to IT: software development and maintenance, hardware installation and maintenance, R&D for improvements or new projects, etc.
